GLOBAL.title: General Filling Instructions
GLOBAL.instruction: The form must be filled in BLACK ink and in CAPITAL LETTERS. All fields marked with an asterisk (*) are mandatory.
rejections: Form not filled in capital letters
Form not filled using black ink

DATE.title: Date of Application
DATE.instruction: Write today's date in DD-MM-YYYY format. Do not use a future date.

CUST_NAME_1.title: Primary Applicant Name
CUST_NAME_1.instruction: Write the full name of the first account holder exactly as it appears in your bank passbook.
rejections: Name does not match bank records

CUST_NAME_2.title: Second Applicant Name
CUST_NAME_2.instruction: If this is a joint account, write the name of the second holder here. Leave blank if you are the only holder.
rejections: Name does not match bank records

CUST_NAME_3.title: Third Applicant Name
CUST_NAME_3.instruction: If there is a third joint holder, write their name here. Otherwise, leave blank.

FD_ACC_NO.title: Fixed Deposit Account Number
FD_ACC_NO.instruction: Fill this only if closing an FD. Write the specific FD account number you want to close (found on your FD receipt).

PRINCIPAL_AMT.title: Principal Amount
PRINCIPAL_AMT.instruction: Write the original amount you deposited in this FD.
rejections: Amount does not match bank records

LIQ_MODE_FULL.title: Full Liquidation Checkbox
LIQ_MODE_FULL.instruction: Tick this box if you want to withdraw the ENTIRE amount and close the FD completely.

LIQ_MODE_PARTIAL.title: Partial Liquidation Checkbox & Amount
LIQ_MODE_PARTIAL.instruction: Tick this box ONLY if you want to withdraw a specific portion of the money. Write the exact amount you want to take out next to it.

PAYOUT_IDFC.title: Credit to IDFC Bank Account
PAYOUT_IDFC.instruction: Tick this box to transfer money to your own IDFC First Bank savings account. Write your account number in the space provided.
rejections: Account number is not an IDFC account

PAYOUT_OTHER_BANK_NAME.title: Other Bank Name
PAYOUT_OTHER_BANK_NAME.instruction: If transferring to a DIFFERENT bank, write the name of that bank here (e.g., 'HDFC Bank').
rejections: Bank name missing when transfer selected

PAYOUT_OTHER_ACC_NO.title: Other Bank Account Number
PAYOUT_OTHER_ACC_NO.instruction: Write the account number of the other bank where you want the money sent.
rejections: Account number missing when transfer selected

PAYOUT_OTHER_IFSC.title: IFSC Code
PAYOUT_OTHER_IFSC.instruction: Write the 11-character IFSC code of the other bank branch (found on your cheque book).

RD_ACC_NO.title: Recurring Deposit Account Number
RD_ACC_NO.instruction: Fill this only if closing a Recurring Deposit (RD). Write the RD account number here.

RD_PAYOUT_ACC.title: RD Payout Account
RD_PAYOUT_ACC.instruction: Write the IDFC Bank account number where the RD money should be credited.

SIGNATURE_1.title: First Account Holder Signature
SIGNATURE_1.instruction: The primary applicant must sign here. The signature must match the one the bank has on file.

SIGNATURE_2.title: Second Account Holder Signature
SIGNATURE_2.instruction: If there is a joint holder, they must sign here.

SIGNATURE_3.title: Third Account Holder Signature
SIGNATURE_3.instruction: If there is a third holder, they must sign here.

BANK_USE_ONLY.title: For Bank Use Only
BANK_USE_ONLY.instruction: This section is to be completed by bank officials only, including service request number, employee ID, branch details, and official signature.
